snippet: The authorities have opened a criminal investigation into the fiery wreck of a runaway oil train on Saturday in Lac-Megantic, Quebec.
abstract: Canadian authorities have opened investigation into runaway oil train that killed at least15 people and destroyed 30 buildings in Lac-Megantic, Quebec.
lead_paragraph: The authorities have opened a criminal investigation into the fiery wreck of a runaway oil train on Saturday in Lac-Megantic, Quebec.

headline.main: Canada: Criminal Investigation Is Begun Into Deadly Train Crash
headline.print_headline: Canada: Criminal Investigation Is Begun Into Deadly Train Crash
